title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
**Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - The Ultimate Solution for Your Heating Needs**

Are you tired of using bulky and inefficient space heaters that waste energy and take up valuable space? Look no further! Our KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat is here to revolutionize the way you heat your home, dorm, office, or kitchen.

**Effortless Heating**

With its powerful 15,000W heating element, this compact heater can quickly warm up a room of up to 200 square feet. Its advanced thermostat technology allows for precise temperature control, ensuring that you stay comfortable without wasting energy.

**Safety First**

We've got your safety covered with our ETL-certified ceramic portable heater fan. It features automatic shut-off at 45 degrees, tip-over protection, and overheat protection, giving you peace of mind while using it.

**Portability and Convenience**

At just 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" in size and weighing only 2.6 pounds, this space heater is easy to move around and store when not in use. Its compact design makes it perfect for small spaces or rooms with limited floor space.

**Three Modes for Your Convenience**

Choose from three convenient modes: high heat (15,000W), low heat (7,500W), or air circulation only (fan mode). This gives you the flexibility to adjust the heater to your needs and preferences.

**Quiet Operation**

Don't let noise disturb your peace. Our KISSAIR Compact Space Heater operates at a whisper-quiet level of below 45 dB, ensuring that you can enjoy comfortable heat without disturbance.

**Upgrade Your Heating Experience**

Say goodbye to bulky space heaters and hello to the KISSAIR Compact 15,000W/7,500W Space Heater with Thermostat. Order now and experience the perfect blend of power, safety, and convenience in a compact and portable package!

**Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - Your Perfect Solution for Year-Round Comfort**

Stay warm and cozy all year round with the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater, a powerful and energy-efficient indoor heater that's perfect for home, dorm, office, or kitchen use. This compact ceramic portable heater fan is designed to provide fast and efficient heating in just 2 seconds, while also ensuring your safety and comfort.

**Three Modes for Maximum Flexibility**

Enjoy the versatility of this space heater with three modes: high heat (15,000W), low heat (7,500W), and air circulation. Choose the mode that suits your needs - whether you need to warm up quickly or maintain a gentle breeze on a chilly day.

**ETL Certified for Your Peace of Mind**

Rest assured with our ETL certified product, which meets strict safety standards and ensures reliable performance. Our heater automatically turns off when it reaches 45 degrees to prevent overheating, providing an added layer of protection for you and your family.

**Compact and Portable Design**

Weighing only 2.6 pounds and measuring 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13", this space heater is easy to move around and fits perfectly on any table or countertop. Its sleek black design also blends seamlessly with your home decor.

**PTC Ceramic Heating Element for Energy Efficiency**

Our KISSAIR Compact Space Heater features a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) ceramic heating element, which ensures efficient heat generation while reducing energy consumption. This means you can enjoy warmth without breaking the bank or harming the environment.

**Quiet Operation and Intuitive Controls**

With a noise level of below 45 dB, this space heater is designed to operate quietly, ensuring you can focus on your daily activities without distractions. Our intuitive controls also make it easy to adjust the temperature and mode with ease.

**Perfect for Small Spaces**

This compact space heater is ideal for small areas up to 200 square feet, making it perfect for bedrooms, offices, or kitchens. Its rapid heat generation ensures that you'll feel warm and cozy in no time.

**Order Now and Experience the Comfort You Deserve!**

Don't wait any longer to enjoy the warmth and comfort you deserve. Order your KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat today and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and energy efficiency.

Enjoy three convenient modes: high heat (15,000W), low heat (750W), and air circulation. Whether you need a gentle warm breeze or intense heat, this heater has got you covered.
